summary.span: 提供使用户能够更改其网站密码的用户界面。

span.span: Provides a user interface that enable users to change their Web site password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [发送电子邮件Sending Email Messages](#sending_email_messages) - [视图Views](#views) - [样式和模板Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [访问密钥和选项卡索引Access Keys and Tab Indexes](#access_keys_and_tab_indexes) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [在 Page_Load 和 Page_Init 期间访问控件Accessing Controls During Page_Load and Page_Init](#accessing_controls_during_page_load_and_page_init) - [应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法 #Declarative Syntax#](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件在页上，若要启用您的网站用户更改他们用于登录到你的网站上的密码。Use the control on a page to enable your Web site users to change the passwords they use to log on to your Web site. > [!NOTE] > 如果不熟悉 ASP.NET 中提供的登录控件集，请阅读[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)然后再继续。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过 HTTP 传输密码是潜在的安全威胁。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 可以查看或被恶意用户破坏 HTTP 传输。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 为了提高安全性，使用登录控件时，您应使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 加密使用 HTTPS 协议以确保在回发过程中，无法读取用户的密码。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 控件使用定义的成员资格提供程序属性来更改 Web 站点的成员资格提供程序数据存储区中存储的密码。The control uses the membership provider defined in the property to change the password stored in the membership provider data store for the Web site. 如果不分配成员身份提供商，控件使用 Web.config 文件的部分中定义的默认成员资格提供程序。If you do not assign a membership provider, the control uses the default membership provider defined in the section of the Web.config file. 控件使用户可以执行以下操作：The control enables users to perform the following actions: - 如果处于登录状态，请更改其密码。Change their password if they are logged on. - 更改其密码，如果不将它们记录，只要页面，其中包含控制允许匿名访问和属性是`true`。Change their password if they are not logged on, as long as the page that contains the control allows anonymous access and the property is `true`. - 更改用户帐户的密码，即使它们以不同用户身份登录。Change the password for a user account, even if they are logged on as a different user. 这需要属性设置为`true`。This requires the property to be `true`. 设置属性设置为`true`显示用户名文本框中，这样用户就可以键入用户名称。Setting the property to `true` displays the User Name text box, which allows the user to type in a user name. 如果用户登录使用登录的用户的名称填充控件。If the user is logged on, the control is populated with the name of the logged-on user. 更改给定的用户名的密码后，用户登录到已更改密码时，关联的帐户即使用户已不登录到该帐户之前。After the password for the given user name is changed, the user is logged on to the account associated with the changed password, even if the user was not logged on to that account previously. > [!IMPORTANT] > 接受用户输入是潜在的安全威胁。Accepting user input is a potential security threat. 恶意用户可以发送数据旨在暴露安全漏洞，或运行程序，请尝试生成的密码。Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords. 为了提高安全性，处理用户输入时，应使用您的控件的验证功能和安全配置的任何数据提供程序为您的控件。To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)， [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)，并[保护成员资格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). ## 发送电子邮件Sending Email Messages 控件可以配置为使用电子邮件服务将向用户发送新密码。The control can be configured to use email services to send the new password to the user. 若要从任何 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件向用户发送电子邮件消息，您必须配置电子邮件服务器的 Web.config 文件中为应用程序。To send email messages to users from any of ASP.NET Web server controls, you must configure an email server in the Web.config file for your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 使用配置电子邮件消息类。Email messages are configured using the class. 必须设置属性来指示 ASP.NET 发送电子邮件。You must set the property to instruct ASP.NET to send email. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件消息通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). > [!NOTE] > 不能保证用户将接收或查看电子邮件。It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message. 若要验证用户已收到一条消息，提供使用户可以确认已收到通知电子邮件消息中的确认链接。To verify that a user has received a message, provide a confirmation link in the email message that lets the user confirm that the notification was received. ## 视图Views 控件具有两个状态或视图：The control has two states, or views: - 更改密码视图请求的当前密码，并要求用户键入新密码两次以确认。Change Password view Requests the current password, and requires the user to type the new password twice for confirmation. 如果允许用户将无法登录要更改其密码，请将属性设置为`true`以显示更改密码视图中的控件。If you allow users who are not logged on to change their passwords, set the property to `true` to display the control in Change Password view. 控件允许用户提供其已注册的用户名。The control allows the user to provide their registered user name. 如果更改密码时出错，错误消息显示在更改密码视图，允许用户以重试。If there is an error when changing the password, an error message is displayed in the Change Password view, allowing the user to try again. - 成功视图提供确认密码已更改。Success view Provides confirmation that the password has been changed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 有关更改密码、 继续和取消按钮的功能附加到具有正确的命令名称，而不考虑哪些视图按钮放置在任何按钮。The functionality for changing passwords and for continue and cancel is attached to any button that has the correct command name, regardless of which view the button is placed on. 例如，一个具有值的按钮`commandname=changepassword`成功视图将尝试更改密码并抛出异常。For example, a button with the value `commandname=changepassword` in the Success view will attempt to change the password and result in an exception. ## 样式和模板Styles and Templates 可以使用一组广泛的样式属性的外观进行自定义控件。You can use an extensive set of style properties to customize the appearance of the control. 或者，在两个视图到应用自定义模板，如果需要完全控制的外观控件。Alternatively, you can apply custom templates to the two views if you need complete control over the appearance of the control. 如果定义了视图模板属性将被应用。If you define a template for a view, the properties are applied. 你必须在视图模板中设置的控件的列表，请参阅和属性。For a list of the controls that you must set in the view templates, see the and properties. 控制检查模板中的内容和所需的控件找不到、 名为不正确，或错误类型的未引发异常。The control examines the content in the template and throws an exception if a required control is not found, is not named correctly, or is of the wrong type. 例如，如果您使用的模板并设置中的内容属性设置为`true`，则将引发异常，如果或某些其他用户名找不到控件。For example, if you use the content in the template and set the property to `true`, the will throw an exception if a or some other control is not found for the user name. 下表列出了控件的样式属性并说明它们会影响哪些 UI 元素。The following table lists the control style properties and describes which UI element they affect. 有关每个样式应用于属性的列表，请参阅单独的样式属性。For a list of the properties to which each style applies, see the individual style property. | 样式属性 style property|UI 元素UI element| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| ||在更改密码视图上的取消按钮。Cancel button on the Change Password view.| ||更改密码按钮更改密码视图上。Change Password button on the Change Password view.| ||在成功视图继续按钮。Continue button on the Success view.| ||向用户显示错误文本。Error text displayed to the user.| ||指向其他页的超链接。Hyperlinks to other pages.| ||介绍如何使用的页面上的说明文本控件。Instructional text on the page that describes how to use the control.| ||所有输入字段，例如文本框的标签。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||为网站提供了可接受的密码的提示。Hints for providing an acceptable password for the Web site.| ||已成功更改密码时向用户显示的文本。Text displayed to the user when the password has been successfully changed.| ||文本输入的输入的字段。Text entry input fields.| ||更改密码和成功视图的标题。Titles for the Change Password and Success views.| ## 应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles 控制，可以在标记中指定的 CSS 样式规则。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果使用模板的外观进行自定义控件，您可以在模板中标记中指定的 CSS 样式。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在这种情况下，没有额外的外部表是必需的。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 可以防止表通过设置呈现属性设置为`false`。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 验证分组Validation Groupings 控件，以便与相同的页面上的其他字段使用的验证组单独验证控件。The control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the control can be validated separately. 默认情况下属性的控件用作验证组的名称。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如，控件的 id`"ChangePassword1"`将使用的验证组名称`ChangePassword1`也。For example, a control with the ID `"ChangePassword1"` will use a validation group name of `ChangePassword1` as well. 若要设置的验证组，控件的一部分，您必须与该控件创建模板，然后更改的验证组名称。To set the validation group that the control is part of, you must create a template with the control, and then change the validation group name. 若要显示错误消息如果某位用户离开控件为空，添加到页面的控件。To show error messages if a user leaves a control empty, add a control to the page. 设置的属性控制对属性的控件。Set the property of the control to the property of the control. ## 访问密钥和选项卡索引Access Keys and Tab Indexes 有关如何使用信息属性和的属性控件，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to use the property and the property of a control, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 在 Page_Load 和 Page_Init 期间访问控件Accessing Controls During Page_Load and Page_Init 控制属性，如由文本框中，表示和，页面生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 具体而言，在 Page_Init 和 Page_Load 阶段，这些属性具有相同的值它们具有呈现控件。In particular, during the Page_Init and Page_Load phases, these properties have the same value they had when the control was rendered. 如果用户更改的值通过修改属性文本框中，新值将为可用，当引发更改的事件时，在 Page_Load 阶段之后出现这种情况。If the user changes the value of the property by modifying the text box, the new value will be available when the changed event is raised, which occurs after the Page_Load phase. 因此，如果您设置的值Page_Init 阶段或 Page_Load 阶段中的属性，并提供自定义处理程序事件，用户在进行任何更改文本框中重写 Page_Init 中设置的值或Page_Load 阶段。Therefore, if you set the value of the property in the Page_Init phase or Page_Load phase and provide a custom handler for a event, any change that the user makes in the text box overrides the value set in the Page_Init or Page_Load phase. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性来定义正则表达式检查密码以确保它们满足以下条件：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 是大于六个字符。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 中包含的密码要求属性显示给用户。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果用户输入的密码不符合的要求属性中中, 包含的文本属性显示给用户。If the password entered by the user does not meet the requirements of the property, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未输入新密码，在所包含的文本属性显示给用户。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新密码必须满足最低要求设置在， ，和属性。The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求，引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段来表示`CommandName`取消按钮的值。Use the field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Cancel button. 配置任何按钮以模拟的取消按钮的功能时，这是有用控件。This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Cancel button of the control. 若要将取消功能分配到任何中包含的控件控件，将设置属性中包含的字符串到按钮字段。To assign cancel functionality to any control contained in the control, set the property of the button to the string that is contained in the field. 取消按钮可出现在 ChangePassword 模板或成功模板。The Cancel button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template. 单击成功模板上的取消按钮不会撤消密码更改;它将清除文本框。Clicking the Cancel button on the Success template will not undo the password change; it will clear the text boxes. 若要将自定义功能添加到取消按钮，创建的事件处理程序事件。To add custom functionality to the Cancel button, create an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于使用自定义的样式设置属性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|取消按钮的颜色。The color of the Cancel button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|取消按钮周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the Cancel button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|取消按钮周围的边框样式。The style of the border around the Cancel button. 此样式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些样式不清楚地显示除非`BorderWidth`设置大于 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` setting is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|取消按钮周围的边框的宽度。The width of the border around the Cancel button.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现取消按钮的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Cancel button. 如果指定了其他设置，这些值将覆盖样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗体类型显示取消按钮文本。`true` to display the Cancel button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜体显示的取消按钮文本。`true` to display the Cancel button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要显示其上面的行与取消按钮文本。`true` to display the Cancel button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|中的取消按钮的文本的大小对象。The size of the text in the Cancel button as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要显示取消按钮文本为带删除线。`true` to display the Cancel button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要显示取消按钮文本带下划线。`true` to display the Cancel button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|在取消按钮文本的颜色。The color of the text in the Cancel button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.|

summary.span: 在用户帐户的密码更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the password is changed for a user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的成员资格提供程序更改的密码后引发事件属性。The event is raised after the password is changed by the membership provider specified in the property. 之后引发事件时，将发生以下情况：After the event is raised, the following occurs: - 如果属性设置，控件尝试在向用户发送一封电子邮件。If the property is set, the control attempts to send an email message to the user. - 用户被重定向到在指定的 Web 站点属性或控件模板中指定显示属性。The user is either redirected to the Web site specified in the property or the control template specified in the property is displayed. 新用户的授权令牌设置后事件之前事件。The new authorization token for the user is set after the event but before the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段来表示`CommandName`更改密码按钮的值。Use the field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Change Password button. 配置任何按钮以模拟的更改密码按钮的功能时，这是有用控件。This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Change Password button of the control. 更改密码按钮完成的最后一步控件。The Change Password button completes the last step in the control. 若要将更改密码功能分配给任何中包含的控件控件，将设置属性中包含的字符串到按钮字段。To assign change-password functionality to any control contained in the control, set the property of the button to the string that is contained in the field. 更改密码按钮可出现在 ChangePassword 模板或成功模板。The Change Password button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template. 在这两种情况下，单击更改密码按钮调用成员资格提供程序，若要更改的密码。In both cases, clicking the Change Password button calls the membership provider to change the password. 若要将自定义功能添加到更改密码按钮，创建的事件处理程序事件。To add custom functionality to the Change Password button, create an event handler for the event.

summary.span: 当更改用户帐户的密码出错时发生。

span.span: Occurs when there is an error changing the password for the user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定成员资格提供程序时引发事件属性尝试更改用户帐户的密码时遇到错误。The event is raised when the membership provider specified in the property encounters an error while attempting to change the password for a user account. 如果用户输入当前密码不正确或无效的新密码，这可能发生。This can occur if the user enters an incorrect current password or an invalid new password. 指定对象并不表示更改密码失败的原因，只有的原因的未更改的密码。The specified object does not indicate the reason why changing the password failed, only that the password was not changed. 使用事件执行自定义操作时未更改的密码。Use the event to perform custom actions when the password is not changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员资格提供程序会拒绝用户输入的密码时，将显示属性。The property is displayed when the membership provider rejects the password entered by the user. 对象不会返回拒绝新的密码的原因。The object does not return a reason for rejecting the new password. 使用事件以检查所拒绝的密码，如果你想要向用户提供有关如何输入 （例如，若要指示必须提供强密码） 的可接受密码的提示。Use the event to examine the rejected password if you want to provide the user with a tip on how to enter an acceptable password (for example, to indicate that a strong password must be provided). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定对象，由控件。The property specifies the object used by the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件模板动态](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。For more information, see [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4). 模板是控件的一组 HTML 元素和控件的特定部分的布局。A template is a set of HTML elements and controls that make up the layout for a particular portion of a control. 模板不同于样式：Templates differ from styles: - 模板定义控件的部分的内容。Templates define the content of a section of a control. - 样式控件中指定元素的外观。Styles specify the appearance of elements in the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件模板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 下表列出了模板和相应的控件视图支持的控件。The following table lists the templates and the corresponding control view that are supported by the control. |模板名称Template name|控件视图Control view| |-------------------|------------------| ||更改密码Change Password| ||成功Success| 您还可以创建或修改.aspx 文件中的控件的模板。You can also create or modify the template for a control in your .aspx file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 ASP.NET Web 控件模板以声明方式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a)并[如何： 创建 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件模板动态](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。For more information, see [How to: Create ASP.NET Web Control Templates Declaratively](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a) and [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates summary.span: 在成员资格提供程序更改用户帐户的密码之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the password for a user account is changed by the membership provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件中指定的成员资格提供程序之前，将引发属性调用以更改用户帐户的密码。The event is raised before the membership provider specified in the property is called to change the password for a user account. 使用事件来执行更改的密码，例如检查以确保它的新密码之前所需的任何处理不是列表中的常见密码。Use the event to perform any processing that is necessary before changing the password, such as checking the new password to make sure it is not in a list of common passwords. 新用户的授权令牌设置后事件之前事件。The new authorization token for the user is set after the event but before the event. 可以通过设置取消事件的属性对象传递给`true`如果事件处理程序确定不应调用成员资格提供程序。The event can be canceled by setting the property of the object to `true` if the event handler determines that the membership provider should not be called. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页面使用控件，并包含用于处理名为事件`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. 事件处理程序中的代码比较中存储的旧密码属性中存储的新密码。The code in the event handler compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果两个密码都相同，更改密码失败。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控件将设置属性设置为`true`来让用户输入其用户名。The control sets the property to `true` to enable users to enter their user name. 这意味着用户不必登录要查看的页面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含由用户输入的重复新密码。The property contains the duplicate new password entered by the user. 可以使用属性来定义新密码的要求。You can use the property to define the requirements for the new password. 此正则表达式用于强制执行客户端上的密码规则。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. ，可以在数据存储区级别配置和服务器端上强制执行密码实施无关。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level and enforced on the server side. 密码必须满足最低要求设置在， ，和属性。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求，引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过 HTTP 传输密码是潜在的安全威胁。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 可以查看或被恶意用户破坏 HTTP 传输。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 为了提高安全性，使用登录控件时，您应使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 加密使用 HTTPS 协议以确保在回发过程中，无法读取用户的密码。To improve security when using login controls, you should use the HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

|-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|继续按钮的颜色。The color of the Continue button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|继续按钮周围的边框的颜色。The color of the border around the Continue button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|继续按钮周围的边框样式。The style of the border around the Continue button. 此样式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些样式不清楚地显示除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|继续按钮周围的边框的宽度。The width of the border around the Continue button.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现继续按钮的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Continue button. 如果指定了其他设置，这些值将覆盖样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗体类型显示继续按钮文本。`true` to display the Continue button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜体显示继续按钮文本。`true` to display the Continue button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要显示继续按钮文本与它上面的行。`true` to display the Continue button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|中的继续按钮的文本的大小对象。The size of the text in the Continue button as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要显示继续按钮文本为带删除线。`true` to display the Continue button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要显示继续按钮文本带下划线。`true` to display the Continue button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|在继续按钮文本的颜色。The color of the text in the Continue button. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|一个，它表示继续按钮的高度。A that represents the height of the Continue button.| |`Width`|一个，表示继续按钮的宽度。A that represents the width of the Continue button.|

summary.span: 获取用户的当前密码。

span.span: Gets the current password for the user.

value.span: 获取用户输入的当前密码。

span.span: The current password entered by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含由用户输入的当前密码。The property contains the current password entered by the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过 HTTP 传输密码是潜在的安全威胁。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 可以查看或被恶意用户破坏 HTTP 传输。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 为了提高安全性，使用登录控件时，您应使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 加密使用 HTTPS 协议以确保在回发过程中，无法读取用户的密码。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页面使用控件，并包含用于处理名为事件`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. 中的代码`ChangingPassword`处理程序比较中存储的旧密码属性中存储的新密码。The code in the `ChangingPassword` handler compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果两个密码都相同，更改密码失败。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控件将设置属性设置为`true`来让用户输入其用户名。The control sets the property to `true` to enable users to enter their user name. 这意味着用户不必登录要查看的页面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要更改其密码，用户必须进行身份验证的成员资格提供程序。In order to change their password, users must be authenticated by the membership provider. 若要允许登录的用户可以不上更改其密码，或要通过使用不同的用户帐户的成员资格提供程序进行身份验证，然后更改该帐户的密码控件可以显示控件能够接受用户名称。To allow users who are not logged on to change their password, or to be authenticated by the membership provider with a different user account and then change the password for that account, the control can display a control to accept the user name. 必须设置属性设置为`true`如果控件将显示为未登录的用户; 否则，用户将不再能够指定用户名称。You must set the property to `true` if the control will be displayed to users who are not logged on; otherwise, the user will not be able to specify a user name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性来显示用户未登录到网站上的控件。The following code example shows how to set the property to display the control to users who are not logged on to the Web site. remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于使用自定义的样式设置属性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|显示错误消息文本的背景的颜色。The color that appears behind the error message text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|错误消息文本周围的边框的颜色。The color of the border around the error message text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|错误消息文本周围的边框样式。The style of the border around the error message text. 此样式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些样式不清楚地显示除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|错误消息文本周围的边框的宽度。The width of the border around the error message text.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现错误消息文本的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error message text. 如果指定了其他设置，这些值将覆盖样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗体显示的错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜体显示的错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要显示错误消息文本中使用它上面的行。`true` to display the error message text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|作为错误消息中的文本的大小对象。The size of the text in the error message as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要显示的错误消息文本为带删除线。`true` to display the error message text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要显示带下划线的错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|错误消息文本中的文本的颜色。The color of the text in the error message text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|一个表示错误消息文本的高度。A that represents the height of the error message text.| |`Width`|一个，表示错误消息文本的宽度。A that represents the width of the error message text.|

summary.span: 获取对一个属性集合的引用，这些属性定义了用户更改其密码后会接收到的电子邮件。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the email message that is sent to users after they have changed their password.

value.span: 对引用对象，用于定义电子邮件发送给新用户。

span.span: A reference to a object that defines the email message sent to a new user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将返回一组属性，用于定义格式和内容的更改其密码后向用户发送的电子邮件消息的引用。The property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the email message sent to users after they have changed their password. 常用的设置包括的主题行和发件人的寄信人地址。Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address. 有关完整的属性列表，请参见 。For a complete list of properties, see . 属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体中设置这些属性*属性*`-`*子属性*，其中*子属性*表示的属性（适用于类示例中， `MailDefinition-Subject`)。You can set these properties in the form *property*`-`*subproperty*, where *subproperty* represents a property of the class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`). 您还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体*属性*`.`*子属性*(例如，`MailDefinition.Subject`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form *Property*`.`*Subproperty* (for example,`MailDefinition.Subject`). 仅当用户具有向成员资格提供程序注册的电子邮件地址发送电子邮件，如果属性的属性指向有效文件。An email message is sent only if the user has an email address registered with the membership provider and if the property of the property points to a valid file. 如果设置属性，则属性必须设置为电子邮件地址; 否则为引发异常。If the property is set, the property must be set to an email address; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 如果电子邮件消息创建从对象，它将使以下表中所示的替换。If the email message is created from the object, it will make the substitutions shown in the following table. 替换文本是不区分大小写。The substitution text is case-insensitive. |替换文本Substitution text|替换为Replaced with| |-----------------------|-------------------| |**<%** `UserName` **%>****<%** `UserName` **%>**|网站用户的用户的名称。The Web site user name of the user.| |**\<%** *Password* **%>****\<%** *Password* **%>**|用户的新密码。The new password for the user.| 如果的属性对象是`true`，邮件消息的内容为 HTML 编码，以防止跨站点脚本的安全漏洞的消息接收方。If the property of the object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML-encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient. 可以使用事件以修改创建的对象对象。You can use the event to modify the object that is created by the object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件消息通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来定义发送到更改其密码的用户的电子邮件。The following code example shows how to use the property to define an email message that is sent to users who change their passwords. 它假定存在名为的文件`MailFile.txt`，包含要发送的电子邮件消息的文本。It assumes that there is a file called `MailFile.txt` that contains the text of the email message to send. 为了能够向用户发送电子邮件消息，你必须配置电子邮件服务器的 Web.config 文件中为应用程序。To be able to send email messages to users, you must configure an email server in the Web.config file for your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordMailDefinition/CS/changepasswordmaildefinitioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordMailDefinition/VB/changepasswordmaildefinitionvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置用于查找成员信息的成员资格提供程序。The property gets or sets the membership provider that is used to look up member information. 如果属性是`null`或为空，默认成员资格提供程序， `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`，使用。If the property is `null` or empty, the default membership provider, `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`, is used. 有关可用于 ASP.NET 应用程序的成员资格提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[成员资格提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)。For more information about the membership providers available to ASP.NET applications, see [Membership Providers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f). 新密码必须满足设置中的成员资格提供程序的最低要求， ，和属性。The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the membership provider in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求，引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 获取用户输入的新密码。

span.span: Gets the new password entered by the user.

value.span: 用户输入的新密码。

span.span: The new password entered by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含由用户输入的新密码。The property contains the new password entered by the user. 可以使用属性来定义新密码的要求。You can use the property to define the requirements for the new password. 此正则表达式用于强制执行客户端上的密码规则。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. 与可以在数据存储区级别配置的密码强制无关。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level. 密码必须满足最低要求设置在， ，和属性。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求，引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过 HTTP 传输密码是潜在的安全威胁。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 可以查看或被恶意用户破坏 HTTP 传输。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 为了提高安全性，使用登录控件时，您应使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 加密使用 HTTPS 协议以确保在回发过程中，无法读取用户的密码。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页面使用控件，并包含用于处理名为事件`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. `ChangingPassword` 比较中存储的旧密码属性中存储的新密码。`ChangingPassword` compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果它们是相同的更改密码失败。If they are the same, changing the password fails. 控件将设置属性设置为`true`以使用户能够输入其用户名。The control sets the property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name. 这意味着用户不必登录要查看的页面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义用于验证你的网站上的用户帐户的密码的要求。Use the property to define the requirements for passwords that are used to validate user accounts on your Web site. 此正则表达式用于强制执行客户端上的密码规则。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. 与可以在数据存储区级别配置的密码强制无关。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level. 密码必须满足最低要求设置在， ，和属性。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求，引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. 若要向用户显示要求，请设置属性。To display requirements to the user, set the property. 如果输入的密码不符合正则表达式中包含属性中中, 包含的文本属性显示给用户。If the password entered does not pass the regular expression contained in the property, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果密码被拒绝的成员资格提供程序，在所包含的文本显示属性。If the password is rejected by the membership provider, the text contained in the property is displayed. 密码标准的一个常见用途是强制用户选择强密码。A common use of password standards is to force users to select strong passwords. 最佳做法是，强制实施密码规则应用于成员资格提供程序中的数据级别。As a best practice, enforce password rules at the data level in the membership provider. 属性允许方便地检查客户端上的密码，但没有锁定来禁止对发出重复的用户尝试登录。The property allows for the convenience of checking the password on the client side, but does not lock out users who make repeated attempts to log on. 若要提高安全性，配置你的成员资格提供程序，以限制用户可登录的尝试次数。To improve security, configure your membership provider to restrict the number of attempts a user may make to log on. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性来定义正则表达式检查密码以确保它们满足以下条件：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 是大于六个字符。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 中包含的密码要求属性显示给用户。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果用户输入的密码不满足条件，在所包含的文本属性显示给用户。If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未输入新密码，在所包含的文本属性显示给用户。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新密码还必须满足最低要求设置在， ，和属性。The new password must also meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求，引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件包含更改密码和成功视图的子控件。The control contains child controls for the Change Password and Success views. 而不是分别引发事件的每个按钮，嵌套的控件中的事件冒泡 （也就是说，它们发送到的命名容器）。Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are bubbled (that is, they are sent to the naming container). 命名容器又引发一般事件调用`ItemCommand`，可以确定哪一个控件引发原始事件的参数值。The naming container in turn raises a generic event called `ItemCommand` with parameter values that allow you to determine which individual control raised the original event. 通过对这一事件做出反应，可以避免编写各个子控件的事件处理方法。By responding to this single event, you can avoid writing event-handling methods for individual child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用中指定的成员资格提供程序更改的密码后属性。The method is called after the password is changed by the membership provider specified in the property. 之后调用方法时，将发生以下情况：After the method is called, the following occurs: - 如果属性设置，控件尝试在向用户发送一封电子邮件。If the property is set, the control attempts to send an email message to the user. - 用户被重定向到在指定的 Web 站点属性或控件模板中指定显示属性。The user is either redirected to the Web site specified in the property or the control template specified in the property is displayed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时方法在派生类中，则一定要调用方法的基类以便注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.para: 重写时方法在派生类中，则一定要调用方法的基类以便注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Raises the event before the user's password is changed by the membership provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用中指定的成员资格提供程序之前属性调用以更改用户的密码。The method is called before the membership provider specified in the property is called to change the user's password. 使用方法来执行更改的密码，例如检查以确保它的新密码之前所需的任何处理不是列表中的常见密码。Use the method to perform any processing that is necessary before changing the password, such as checking the new password to make sure it is not in a list of common passwords. 方法可以取消通过设置事件的属性对象作为传递*e*参数`true`。The method can cancel the event by setting the property of the object passed as the *e* parameter to `true`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页面使用控件，并包含用于处理名为事件`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. `ChangingPassword` 比较中存储的旧密码属性中存储的新密码。`ChangingPassword` compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果两个密码都相同，更改密码失败。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控件将设置属性设置为`true`以使用户能够输入其用户名。The control sets the property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name. 这意味着用户不必登录要查看的页面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用方法来修改后用户更改其密码发送给用户的电子邮件。Use the method to modify the email message that is sent to users after they change their password. 属性的对象将发送到 SMTP 服务器进行处理。The property of the object will be sent to the SMTP server for processing. 修改的属性对象来修改电子邮件。Modify the properties of the object to modify the email message. 创建电子邮件消息时，才的属性由指定的对象属性指向有效的文件名。Email messages are created only when the property of the object specified by the property points to a valid file name. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件消息通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个使用 ASP.NET 网页Web 控件，并包含的事件处理程序名为事件`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功，代码将尝试使用 SMTP 电子邮件发送给用户以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 这是在`SendingMail`事件处理程序。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 对于此示例的目的，它不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造要用于发送电子邮件消息失败的测试。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生某些其他错误，无法发送电子邮件，`SendMailError`调用函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假设事件源的命名 MySamplesSite 已存在 Windows 应用程序事件日志记录一个事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面创建指定的事件源的代码示例。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理该错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式添加名 MySamplesSite 为你的应用程序日志的事件源，请使用下面的代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件源必须存在于第一个代码示例中正常工作的顺序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例可以用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail.htm 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件消息通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

## Remarks 在 SMTP mail 系统引发时尝试发送一封电子邮件，用户更改密码后出现异常时调用方法。The method is called when the SMTP mail system raises an exception while attempting to send an email message after a user has changed a password. 检查的属性对象作为传递`e`参数，以确定异常的实际原因。Examine the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception. 最常见原因是存在配置错误`smtp`Web.config 文件部分。The most common reason is a configuration error in the `smtp` section of the Web.config file. 必须设置对象的属性作为传递`e`参数`true`发出信号，异常已负责; 否则为再次引发异常。You must set the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to `true` to signal that the exception has been taken care of; otherwise, the exception is thrown again. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于使用自定义的样式设置属性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|提示文本的背景色。The color behind the hint text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|提示文本周围的边框的颜色。The color of the border around the hint text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|提示文本周围的边框样式。The style of the border around the hint text. 此样式可以是"None"、"点线"、"虚线"、"纯色"、"双线"、"Groove"、"凸线"、"Inset"或"开始"。The style can be "None", "Dotted", "Dashed", "Solid", "Double", "Groove", "Ridge", "Inset", or "Outset". 默认值为"NotSet"。The default is "NotSet". 某些样式不清楚地显示除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|提示文本周围的边框的宽度。The width of the border around the hint text.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现的提示文本的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the hint text. 如果指定了其他设置，这些值将覆盖样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗体显示的提示文本。`true` to display the hint text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜体显示的提示文本。`true` to display the hint text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要显示其上一条线的提示文本。`true` to display the hint text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|中的提示文本的文本的大小对象。The size of the text in the hint text as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要为带删除线显示提示文本。`true` to display the hint text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要显示带下划线的提示文本。`true` to display the hint text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|中的提示文本的文本的颜色。The color of the text in the hint text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|一个表示提示文本的高度。A that represents the height of the hint text.| |`Width`|一个表示提示文本的宽度。A that represents the width of the hint text.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置有关创建网站密码的要求的信息性文本。The property gets or sets informational text about the requirements for creating a password for the Web site. 使用此属性来描述中指定的新密码要求属性。Use this property to describe the requirements for the new password that are specified in the property. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性来定义正则表达式检查密码以确保它们满足以下条件：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 是大于六个字符。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 中包含的密码要求属性显示给用户。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果用户输入的密码不满足条件，在所包含的文本属性显示给用户。If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未输入新密码，在所包含的文本属性显示给用户。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新密码还必须满足最低要求设置在， ，和属性。The new password must also meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密码不符合这些要求，引发事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/CS/changepasswordpasswordregexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/VB/changepasswordpasswordregexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使嵌入式样式属性，例如将应用到所有为控件呈现的 HTML，ASP.NET 将在呈现的 HTML 包含`table`元素。In order to make inline style properties such as apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element. 如果不希望外部`table`要呈现，元素将此属性设置为`false`。If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`. 在这种情况下，如果您尝试设置应用于整个控件的样式属性的内联，则引发异常。In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以保存状态信息的操作所需的控件。Use the method to save state information required for the operation of the control. 此控件状态数据分开存储的视图状态数据控件。This control state data is stored separately from the view state data for the control. 使用控件状态的自定义控件必须调用方法之前保存控件状态的对象。Custom controls using control state must call the method on the object before saving control state.

span.para: 保存控件状态时，字符串对象返回到客户端作为变量存储在对应的 HTML <type ="hidden"/> 元素。重写方法来提取要在中使用的状态信息控件。控件状态适用于少量的重要数据，例如页索引或关键字。使用控件状态数据量很大，可能会影响页面性能。

When control state is saved, a string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML <input type="hidden" /> element. Override the method to extract the state information to use in the control. Control state is intended for small amounts of critical data, such as a page index or a keyword. Using control state for large amounts of data can adversely affect page performance.

summary.span: 在向用户发送密码已更改的电子邮件确认之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the user is sent an email confirmation that the password has been changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控件将发送确认的密码已更改时电子邮件消息属性定义要发送电子邮件。The control will send an email message confirming that the password has been changed when the property defines an email message to send. 电子邮件包含用户名和密码的自动替换字段。The email message contains automatic replacement fields for the user name and password. 可以使用事件以修改电子邮件发送给用户之前。You can use the event to modify the email message before it is sent to the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件消息通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个使用 ASP.NET 网页Web 控件，并包含的事件处理程序名为事件`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功，代码将尝试使用 SMTP 电子邮件发送给用户以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 这是在`SendingMail`事件处理程序。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 对于此示例的目的，它不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造要用于发送电子邮件消息失败的测试。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生某些其他错误，无法发送电子邮件，`SendMailError`调用函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假设事件源的命名 MySamplesSite 已存在 Windows 应用程序事件日志记录一个事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面创建指定的事件源的代码示例。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理该错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式添加名 MySamplesSite 为你的应用程序日志的事件源，请使用下面的代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件源必须存在于第一个代码示例中正常工作的顺序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例可以用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail.htm 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件消息通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

span.span: Occurs when there is an SMTP error sending an email message to the user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks SMTP 邮件提供商尝试发送电子邮件后用户更改其密码时引发异常时引发事件。The event is raised when the SMTP mail provider throws an exception when trying to send an email message after users have changed their password. 将引发此事件的最常见原因是`smtp`Web.config 文件的节是不正确。The most common reason that this event is raised is that the `smtp` section of the Web.config file is incorrect. 有关详细信息`smtp`部分中，请参阅。For more information about the `smtp` section, see . 默认值事件处理程序不会捕捉或处理的邮件系统中的 SMTP 错误。The default event handler does not catch or handle the SMTP error from the mail system. 你事件处理程序必须设置的属性对象传递给`true`若要停止向用户显示错误。Your event handler must set the property of the object to `true` in order to stop the error from being displayed to users. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个使用 ASP.NET 网页Web 控件，并包含的事件处理程序名为事件`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功，代码将尝试使用 SMTP 电子邮件发送给用户以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 这是在`SendingMail`事件处理程序。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 对于此示例的目的，它不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造要用于发送电子邮件消息失败的测试。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生某些其他错误，无法发送电子邮件，`SendMailError`调用函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假设事件源的命名 MySamplesSite 已存在 Windows 应用程序事件日志记录一个事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面创建指定的事件源的代码示例。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理该错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式添加名 MySamplesSite 为你的应用程序日志的事件源，请使用下面的代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件源必须存在于第一个代码示例中正常工作的顺序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例可以用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail.htm 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件消息通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性时你希望用户成功更改其密码后重定向到你的网站的特定页面。Set the property when you want users to be redirected to a specific page of your Web site after successfully changing their passwords. 如果未设置属性 （设置为默认值），页包含刷新控件和显示属性。If the property is not set (set is the default), the page containing the control is refreshed and the property is displayed. 如果属性设置，则不会显示成功视图。If the property is set, the Success view is not displayed. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定对象，它由控件。The property specifies the object that is used by the control. 仅在使用代码隐藏文件时，才可访问属性。The property is accessible only when using a code-behind file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件模板动态](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。For more information, see [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4). 模板是控件的一组 HTML 元素和控件的特定部分的布局。A template is a set of HTML elements and controls that make up the layout for a particular portion of a control. 模板不同于样式：Templates differ from styles: - 模板定义控件的部分的内容。Templates define the content of a section of a control. - 样式控件中指定元素的外观。Styles specify the appearance of elements in the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件模板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 控件支持以下模板，应用到相应的控件视图。The control supports the following templates, which are applied to the corresponding control view. |模板名称Template name|控件视图Control view| |-------------------|------------------| ||更改密码视图Change Password view| ||成功视图Success view| 您还可以创建或修改.aspx 文件中的控件的模板。You can also create or modify the template for a control in your .aspx file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 ASP.NET Web 控件模板以声明方式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a)。For more information, see [How to: Create ASP.NET Web Control Templates Declaratively](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于使用自定义的样式设置属性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|成功视图文本的背景色。The color behind the Success view text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|成功视图文本周围的边框的颜色。The color of the border around the Success view text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|成功视图文本周围的边框样式。The style of the border around the Success view text. 此样式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些样式不清楚地显示除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|成功视图文本周围的边框的宽度。The width of the border around the Success view text.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现成功视图文本的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Success view text. 如果指定了其他设置，这些值将覆盖样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗体类型显示成功视图文本。`true` to display the Success view text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜体显示成功视图文本。`true` to display the Success view text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要显示成功视图文本与它上面的行。`true` to display the Success view text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|为成功视图文本中的文本的大小对象。The size of the text in the Success view text as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要指示成功视图文本显示为带删除线。`true` to display the Success view text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要显示成功视图文本带下划线。`true` to display the Success view text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|在成功视图文本的文本的颜色。The color of the text in the Success view text. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|一个，它表示成功视图文本的高度。A that represents the height of the Success view text.| |`Width`|一个，表示成功视图文本的宽度。A that represents the width of the Success view text.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于使用自定义的样式设置属性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|标题的背景颜色。The color behind the titles. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|标题周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the titles. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|标题周围边框的样式。The style of the border around the titles. 此样式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 默认值为 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些样式不清楚地显示除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|标题周围边框的宽度。The width of the border around the titles.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现标题的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the titles. 如果指定了其他设置，这些值将覆盖样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗体显示的标题文本。`true` to display the titles text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜体显示的标题文本。`true` to display the titles text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要显示其上一条线的标题文本。`true` to display the titles text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|作为标题中文本的大小对象。The size of the text in the titles as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要为带删除线显示的标题文本。`true` to display the titles text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要显示带下划线的标题文本。`true` to display the titles text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|在标题中的文本的颜色。The color of the text in the titles. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|一个表示标题的高度。A that represents the height of the titles.| |`Width`|一个，表示标题的宽度。A that represents the width of the titles.|
