summary.span: 获取或设置要更改其密码的网站用户名。

span.span: Gets or sets the Web site user name for which to change the password.

value.span: 要更改其密码的用户名。

span.span: The user name for which to change the password.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性获取要为其更改密码的网站用户名称。The property gets the Web site user name for which to change the password. 此外可以使用属性只是为了在获取用户名控件，而无需更改密码。You can also use the property just to get the user name from within the control, without changing the password. 此外，可以从已创建，以从发送电子邮件的电子邮件中使用属性控件中的使用字符串"\<%username%>"电子邮件的正文中。Additionally, the property can be used from within an email message that has been created to send email from the control by using the string "\<%UserName%>" in the body of the email message. 若要允许用户键入用户名，请设置属性设置为`true`。To allow the user to type in a user name, set the property to `true`. 如果用户已通过身份验证，他或她不必输入用户名称。If a user is already authenticated, he or she does not need to enter a user name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个使用 ASP.NET 网页Web 控件，并包含的事件处理程序名为事件`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 代码示例假定 ASP.NET 网站配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和窗体身份验证和已向你知道其名称和密码，创建一个用户。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现简单的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密码更改成功，代码将尝试使用 SMTP 电子邮件发送给用户以确认更改。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 这是在`SendingMail`事件处理程序。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 有关如何配置 SMTP 服务器的信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 对于此示例的目的，它不需要配置 SMTP 服务器;该示例构造要用于发送电子邮件消息失败的测试。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果邮件服务器配置不正确或发生某些其他错误，无法发送电子邮件，`SendMailError`调用函数。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 向用户显示一条消息。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假设事件源的命名 MySamplesSite 已存在 Windows 应用程序事件日志记录一个事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 请参阅下面创建指定的事件源的代码示例。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 有关创建事件源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的属性对象设置为`true`以指示已处理该错误。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果需要以编程方式添加名 MySamplesSite 为你的应用程序日志的事件源，请使用下面的代码示例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件源必须存在于第一个代码示例中正常工作的顺序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下面的代码示例需要管理员权限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例可以用作前面的示例代码的 ChangePasswordMail.htm 文件。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发送用户帐户名或电子邮件中的密码是潜在的安全威胁。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 电子邮件消息通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```
